title: [GAMEPLAY] ZYRA Haunted skin can't show mastery badge after death
body: ZYRA Haunted skin can't show mastery badge after death

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! This appears to be a known issue, but lemme poke the ticket and see where we're at with it! :)

Aww, I love Zyra and am so disappointed by this answer. 

Preferred answer:  don't die, flash mastery, win game. ;)
Thank you, hope you will fix it soon.
